directions: 1. In a large bowl, toss together cabbage, onion, carrot, and jalape単o, if using. In a small saucepan, combine vinegar, salt, and sugar a cook over medium heat, stirring, until salt and sugar are just dissolved. Pour brine over vegetables and toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate for one hour before serving.

html.directions: 1. In a large bowl, toss together cabbage, onion, carrot, and jalape単o, if using. In a small saucepan, combine vinegar, salt, and sugar a cook over medium heat, stirring, until salt and sugar are just dissolved. Pour brine over vegetables and toss to combine. Cover and refrigerate for one hour before serving.
html.ingredients:
• 1/2 small (2-pound) green cabbage, cored and very thinly sliced (about 4 cups)
  • 1/2 medium white onion, peeled and very thinly sliced (about 1/2 cup)
  • 2 carrots, peeled and shredded (about 1/2 cup)
  • 1 small jalape単o, ribs and seeds removed, minced (optional)
  • 3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
  • 2 teaspoons sugar
  • 1 teaspoon kosher salt

ingredients:
1/2 small (2-pound) green cabbage, cored and very thinly sliced (about 4 cups)
1/2 medium white onion, peeled and very thinly sliced (about 1/2 cup)
2 carrots, peeled and shredded (about 1/2 cup)
1 small jalape単o, ribs and seeds removed, minced (optional)
3 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
2 teaspoons sugar
1 teaspoon kosher salt
name: Quick Curtido (Mexican Cabbage Slaw)
